Text: cinavia protected:( sound will cut off on ps3 however if you stream it using ps3 media server it works! hope this helps some of you..

The sound was progressively getting out of sync on my Easy tdt HD'10 and I simply opened it with mkvmerge and saved as mkv and now it's working fine (the audio codec id was "40" in mp4 and now it's A_AAC, but I have other .mp4 with id "40" that work fine, go figure).
No cineavia gaystation problems!
Great 720p quality in 2GB!
Got an email for copyright violation from my ISP for downloading this one. You may want to start a new torrent Bone.
